AppSettings.HistoryTablesEnableQueryTemplate: BEGIN TRANSACTION; BEGIN TRY IF (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND  TABLE_NAME = '{0}History')) BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.{0} ADD PERIOD FOR SYSTEM_TIME ([ValidFrom], [ValidTo]); ALTER TABLE dbo.{0} SET (SYSTEM_VERSIONING = ON (HISTORY_TABLE = dbo.{0}History)); END; COMMIT; END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK TRANSACTION; END CATCH
